translation.en: What's up, fellas?
Where were you? I stopped by to give you a lift.
Had things to do. How's the party?
translation.es: Tenía cosas que hacer.¿Cómo está la fiesta?

translation.en: Don't know. Just got here.
Well, hell, boys...
...let's drop in.
Oh, shit, yeah.
Tyler!
Come on, Caleb. It's not like it's gonna kill us...
translation.es: Vamos, Caleb.No es que esto nos vaya a matar...

translation.en: ...yet.
So give me the scoop. Who's here?
The first thing you have to know is that Aaron Abbot is a prick.
translation.es: Lo primero que debes saberes que Aaron Abbot es un idiota.

translation.en: -Treats girls like dirt. -Okay.
-Who's that? -The new guy.
He's looking over here.
Don't know much about him, but I intend to find out.
translation.es: No sé mucho sobre él,pero tengo la intención de averiguarlo.

translation.en: He's cute.
-Hey, who's that chick with Kate? -Sarah something.
translation.es: -¿Quién es la chica que está con Kate?-Sarah algo.

translation.en: She transferred in from a Boston public.
translation.es: La transfirieron de una escuelapública de Boston.

translation.en: She's kind of hot.
-Yo, Caleb. -They're here.
-Who are they? -The Sons of Ipswich.
-Hey, Kate. -Caleb.
-Hi. You're late. -I had a thing with the family.
-Who's this? -My new roommate.
Sarah, this is Pogue Parry, Tyler Simms...
translation.es: Sarah, ellos son Pogue Parry,Tyler Simms...

translation.en: -...Reid-- -Garwin. Reid Garwin.
-Good evening. -Good evening.
You know, Sarah's my grandmother's name.
-You kind of remind me of her. -Caleb Danvers.
And you don't bring my grandmother to mind in any way.
translation.es: Y no me recuerdas a mi abuelapara nada.

translation.en: Good. Sarah.
-Hey, Caleb. -Kira.
How was your summer?
-I'm Kira. -Sarah.
Oh, right. From the Boston public.
translation.es: Cierto. De la escuela pública de Boston.

translation.en: Tell me, how does one go about getting into Spenser from a public?
translation.es: ¿Cómo hace uno para entrar a Spenserdesde una escuela pública?

translation.en: -Why don't you give it a rest, Kira? -Why don't you give it a rest?
translation.es: -¿Por qué no te calmas, Kira?-¿Por qué no te calmas tú?

translation.en: -I don't want any trouble, Aaron. -I'm sure you don't.
translation.es: -No quiero problemas, Aaron.-Estoy seguro de eso.

translation.en: You posers make me wanna puke.
translation.es: Ustedes los pretenciosos me dan asco.

translation.en: -Is that right? -Hey, let it go.
I think you owe Kira an apology.
translation.es: Creo que le debes una disculpa a Kira.

translation.en: Actually, I think Kira owes Sarah the apology.
translation.es: Más bien creo que Kirale debe la disculpa a Sarah.

translation.en: You were being kind of bitchy.
Disgusting! You idiot!
Guys, Dylan just called.
He said he saw three cop cars headed this way on Old Dell Road.
translation.es: Vio tres patrullas de policía que vienenhacia acá por Old Dell Road.

translation.en: -Hey, let's roll! -Let's go.
-Let's go, boys. -Let's go!
-You need a ride? -No, Sarah drove us out here.
translation.es: -¿Necesitan que las lleven?-No, Sarah nos trajo.

translation.en: -Will I see you back at the dorms? -It's getting late. I'm just gonna crash.
translation.es: -¿Te veré en los dormitorios?-Es tarde. Me voy a dormir.

translation.en: Call me in the morning?
-I could use a lift. -No problem.
translation.es: -Me vendría bien un aventón.-No hay problema.

translation.en: -Hey, nice going back there. Caleb. -Chase.
Thought that guy and I were about to go at it.
translation.es: Pensé que ese tipo y yoíbamos a acabar peleando.

translation.en: His friend's puking sure came at an opportune time.
translation.es: El vómito de su amigollegó en el momento oportuno.

translation.en: Didn't it, though?
Yeah, yeah, yeah. Hop in my truck.
translation.es: Sí, sí, sí. Suban a mi camioneta.

translation.en: -Good night. -I got room. Who needs a ride?
Hey, guys, let's go. We gotta go before the cops come.
translation.es: Chicos, vamos.Antes de que lleguen los policías.

translation.en: Sarah wants you, man.
-That's bullshit. -Oh, now. Don't be jealous, Reid.
translation.es: -Eso es mentira.-No te pongas celoso, Reid.

translation.en: -My car won't start! -Hop in with us.
-I can't just leave it here! -I could fix it for you.
translation.es: -¡No lo puedo dejar aquí!-Yo te lo podría arreglar.

translation.en: -Reid, don't. -It's not over yet, boys.
Let it go. It's his life, man.
Try it again.
Thank you!
-Gotta bolt. Move over. -It's my car.
Move over, baby boy. Now!
No sweat.
We gotta pull over.
You wanna stop? That'll impress Harvard.
All right, what the hell? Let's lose them.
Cut across Marblehead. We might as well have some fun.
Lose them!
-Step on it. Go! -Stupid kids.
All right, guys, you ready?
Come on, Caleb. It's gonna take all of us.
Hey, they don't know. Hit the horn. Hit the horn!
translation.es: No lo saben.Toca el claxon. ¡Toca el claxon!

translation.en: -Holy shit, they're going over. -Harry Potter can kiss my ass!
translation.es: -Mierda, no se están deteniendo.-¡Harry Potter puede irse al demonio!

translation.en: Stop the car! Stop the car!
Son of a bitch.
We must be the last ones in.
translation.es: Somos de los últimos en llegar.

translation.en: Well, this is us.
-Just a sec. -Oh, my God!
-Hate those things. -And they're all over the place here.
translation.es: -Odio esas cosas.-Y aquí hay por todos lados.

translation.en: Thank you.
See? Chivalry's not dead after all.
No, it just transferred in.
We're gonna go into town tomorrow for some things.
translation.es: Mañana iremos al pueblopor algunas cosas.

translation.en: -Do you need to pick up any stuff? -Sure.
I'm in 311. Call me.
Okay.
-He's hot, huh? -Listen to you.
-Thanks for the ride. -All right. Take it easy.
-I'll see you later, man. -Call me in the morning.
translation.es: -Nos vemos después, viejo.-Llámame en la mañana.

translation.en: You're home early.
It's after midnight, Mother. What are you still doing up?
translation.es: Es más de medianoche, madre.¿Por qué sigues despierta?

translation.en: Thinking about my baby turning 18 this week.
translation.es: Pienso que mi bebé cumple 18esta semana.

translation.en: God. You look so much like him in this light.
translation.es: Dios. Te pareces tanto a él con esta luz.

translation.en: You know, he was a year younger than you when we met.
translation.es: Él era un año más joven que túcuando nos conocimos.

translation.en: Did I ever tell you that?
Yeah. You've told me.
Now, let's get you up to bed.
So handsome.
He was the most beautiful man I'd ever seen.
translation.es: Era el hombre más hermosoque haya visto.

translation.en: I'm so afraid I'll lose you like I did him.
translation.es: Me da mucho miedo perdertecomo lo perdí a él.

translation.en: How many times do I need to tell you that I'm not him?
translation.es: ¿Cuántas veces debo decirteque no soy él?

translation.en: That's the same thing he said about his father.
translation.es: Es lo mismo que él dijo sobre su padre.

translation.en: You know, these powers...
...that you and your friends developed when you were 13...
translation.es: ...que tú y tus amigos desarrollaroncuando tenían 13...

translation.en: ...are nothing compared with what you'll get when you ascend.
translation.es: ...no son nada comparadoscon lo que obtienen cuando ascienden.

translation.en: They are 1000 times stronger.
They are so seductive.
You'll suddenly think...
...the world is yours for the taking.
And then you really start to use...
...and use...
...aging each time.
Taking bits of your life...
translation.es: Se llevan partes de tu vida...

translation.en: -...until there is nothing left. -I won't.
translation.es: -...hasta que no queda nada.-No lo haré.

translation.en: That's what he said.
I can't lose you both.
I won't survive it this time.
I won't.
So why do you call them "the Sons of Ipswich"?
translation.es: ¿Por qué los llaman"los Hijos de Ipswich"?

translation.en: What are they? Like, a boy band?
You know what? I like you. You're funny.
Not like all the other stuck-up bitches.
translation.es: No como todas esas perras estiradas.

translation.en: No. They're supposedly descendants of five families...
translation.es: Se supone que son descendientesde cinco familias...

translation.en: ...that settled the Ipswich Colony in the 1600s.
translation.es: ...que se asentaron en la colonia Ipswichen el siglo XVII.

translation.en: Old money.
Caleb and Reid were both checking you out tonight.
translation.es: Caleb y Reid te estaban viendo mucho esta noche.

translation.en: If it were me, I'd go for Caleb.
translation.es: Si fuera yo, optaría por Caleb.

translation.en: Why?
He's just one of those majorly good guys.
translation.es: Es uno de esos tipos extremadamente buenos.

translation.en: Well, how do you mean?
He could stay here and party with the rest of us...
translation.es: Podría quedarse aquíy estar de fiesta con todos...

translation.en: ...but he stays at home to take care of his mom.
translation.es: ...pero se queda en casapara cuidar a su mamá.

translation.en: What's wrong with her?
After Caleb's dad died, she became a bit of an alcoholic.
translation.es: Cuando murió el papá de Caleb,se volvió un poco alcohólica.

translation.en: So is he seeing anyone?
So we are interested.
-So who's the fifth? -Fifth what?
translation.es: -¿Y quién es el quinto?-¿El quinto qué?

translation.en: Well, you said five families.
They say the fifth was killed during the witch-hunt.
translation.es: Dicen que la quinta familiamurió en la cacería de brujas.

translation.en: -What? -Cool, huh?
Or creepy.
Couldn't see nothing but their taillights in the damn fog.
translation.es: Solo veíamos sus luces traseraspor la maldita niebla.

translation.en: But I swear to God...
...it sure seemed like they went right off the damn cliffs.
What you were probably looking at...
translation.es: Es probable que lo que vieran...

translation.en: ...were the aircraft warning lights on the Marblehead lighthouse.
translation.es: ...fueran las luces de una aeronaveen el faro de Marblehead.

translation.en: Captain, we have a suspect vehicle with occupant back near the Dells.
translation.es: Capitán, tenemos un vehículo sospechosocon ocupante cerca de Dells.

translation.en: Respond and advise.
We tried to wake him, but he's passed out cold.
translation.es: Tratamos de despertarlopero está como congelado.

translation.en: Doors are all locked.
Go ahead and call it in. We're gonna need a tow.
translation.es: Adelante, hagan la llamada.Necesitaremos una grúa.

translation.en: Hey, kid!
Open up!
Give me your flashlight.
Break out the rear window.
Son.
Somebody there?
Hello?
Hello?
-Oh, my God. -Didn't mean to scare you.
-Oh, my God. -Just got back.
Sorry. I'm just a little freaked out.
translation.es: Lo siento. Estoy un poco alterada.

translation.en: It felt like someone was watching me in the showers.
translation.es: Sentí como que alguien me observabaen las duchas.

translation.en: Let's take a look, shall we?
It's okay.
Don't see anyone.
-I'll catch you later, then. -Yeah, see you.
-What makes you think it was Reid? -It's always him.
translation.es: -¿Por qué piensas que fue Reid?-Siempre es él.

translation.en: I've never felt it when one of us used The Power. Have you?
translation.es: Nunca había sentido cuando uno de nosotrosusaba el Poder. ¿Y tú?

translation.en: No. I don't know, maybe it's because you're so close to ascending.
translation.es: No sé, tal vez sea porque estásmuy cerca de ascender.

translation.en: I don't know. Maybe.
I'm telling you, it was strong enough to wake me out of a dead sleep.
translation.es: Te digo que fue tan fuerteque me despertó de un sueño profundo.

translation.en: He's only using his powers to piss you off...
translation.es: Solo usa sus poderes para molestarte...

translation.en: ...because he's jealous you're ascending first, man.
translation.es: ...porque está celosode que ascenderás primero, viejo.

translation.en: I'm telling you, just-- Jesus!
Caleb?
What's going on, Caleb? Pick up.
Caleb, pick up the phone, man.
Caleb, what's going on?
I just saw a darkling.
It was in the form of that dead kid they found at the Dells.
translation.es: Tenía la forma del chico muertoque encontraron en Dells.

translation.en: I saw his picture this morning in the newspaper.
translation.es: Vi su fotografía en el periódico.

translation.en: -But who'd send you a darkling? -I have no idea.
translation.es: -Pero ¿quién te envió un espectro?-No tengo idea.

translation.en: Something's wrong. I can feel it.
We gotta talk to Reid tonight.
translation.es: Debemos hablar con Reid esta noche.

translation.en: He'll probably be at Nicky's.
translation.es: Es probable que esté en Nicky's.

translation.en: -We'll see him then. -Definitely.
-Here you go, Caleb. -Thanks.
Hey, Caleb.
-Oh, hey, Kate. What are you up to? -I'm just stocking up our room.
translation.es: -Hola, Kate. ¿Qué haces?-Compro algo para la habitación.

translation.en: -Did you hear about the dead kid? -Yeah, I did.
translation.es: -¿Oíste sobre el chico muerto?-Sí, lo sé.

translation.en: Did you know him?
No. No, he just transferred in.
translation.es: No. No, lo acababan de transferir.

translation.en: Yeah, I heard he lived on Reid and Tyler's floor.
translation.es: Oí que vivía en el piso de Reid y Tyler.

translation.en: -Hi. -Hi there.
You scared me.
-Hey, man. -Hey.
I'm gonna see if Pogue wants to catch that new Brad Pitt flick this afternoon.
translation.es: Veré si Pogue quiere ver la nueva películade Brad Pitt esta tarde.

translation.en: -Who else wants to go? -I will.
I gotta run some errands for my mother.
translation.es: Debo hacer algunos encargospara mi mamá.

translation.en: I already saw it.
-Do you feel like running errands? -Sure.
I wish I'd brought my camera. This place is so beautiful.
translation.es: Ojalá hubiera traído mi cámara.Este lugar es muy hermoso.

translation.en: That's the old Putnam barn. What's left of it.
translation.es: Ese es el viejo granero Putnam.Lo que queda de él.

translation.en: This whole place, for miles around, was the original Ipswich Colony.
translation.es: Todo este lugar, muchos kilómetrosa la redonda, era la colonia Ipswich.

translation.en: -So, what brought you to Spenser? -A scholarship.
translation.es: -¿Y qué te trajo a Spenser?-Una beca.

translation.en: -But why Spenser? -I want to go to Harvard.
-My father was class of '81. -That's so cool.
translation.es: -Mi padre es de la clase del 81.-Eso es genial.

translation.en: -Kate told me he passed away. -You and Kate talk about me?
translation.es: -Kate me dijo que había muerto.-¿Kate y tú hablan de mí?

translation.en: Well, you know, just girl stuff.
translation.es: Ya sabes, solo cosas de chicas.

translation.en: It's our family's first colony house.
translation.es: Es la primera casa en la coloniade nuestra familia.

translation.en: -Wait. Somebody lives here? -Just our caretaker, Gorman.
Gorman! It's me! It's okay!
-He doesn't see that well anymore. -You think?
-Who's with you? -Just a friend.
-I'll be right back, okay? -Okay.
-You should be more careful. -I know, Gorman.
-Is there anything else he needs? -No.
I'll see you next week, then.
translation.es: Entonces te veré la próxima semana.

translation.en: -Okay? -Yeah. Yeah, I'm okay.
So you wanna shower or change first?
-For what? -We're going to Nicky's.
What's Nicky's?
Hey. How are you?
Oh, hey, baby! You missed a great movie.
Yeah, I had to get my bike fixed.
translation.es: Sí, tenía que arreglar mi motocicleta.

translation.en: That's cool. Chase hung out and kept me company.
translation.es: Está bien. Chase se quedóy me hizo compañía.

translation.en: I'll just bet he did.
-What's up, man? -It's all good.
You want something to eat?
I'll just pick at whatever you're having.
translation.es: Comeré algo de lo que tú comas.

translation.en: Can I get a burger, fries and a Coke?
translation.es: ¿Me das una hamburguesa, papasy refresco de cola?

translation.en: -Corner pocket. -Great shot.
Well, well, well....
-How long you guys been here? -A bit.
Just been playing Aaron and Bordy, and-- Would you look at that?
translation.es: Jugábamos con Aaron y Bordy,y... ¿Quieren ver eso?

translation.en: -Blue, cotton. -Pink, lace.
Boys, that girl hasn't worn panties since she was 12.
translation.es: Chicos, ella no ha usado pantaletasdesde que tenía 12 años.

translation.en: Yeah. Thanks, boys.
Keep the change.
Next time.
You guys are real tight, huh?
Families are real close. We kind of grew up together.
-We're kind of like brothers. -That must have been nice.
-The best two out of three. -Okay.
Hey, Chase. Mind if I get in a game?
translation.es: Oye, Chase.¿Te importa si juego un poco?

translation.en: Yeah, yeah. Sure.
Reid and Tyler are here.
-Where? -Pool tables. With Aaron and the boys.
translation.es: -¿Dónde?-Mesas de billar. Con Aaron y los chicos.

translation.en: Great. That's trouble.
So Caleb tells me you guys are swimmers.
translation.es: Caleb me dice que son nadadores.

translation.en: Spenser's best. State finals twice.
translation.es: Los mejores de Spenser.Dos veces en la final estatal.

translation.en: I swam for Hastings. I was their freestyle man.
translation.es: Yo nadé para Hastings.Era el mejor en estilo libre.

translation.en: You won't be here. That's Caleb's swim.
translation.es: Aquí no lo serás. Es el estilo de Caleb.

translation.en: -Okay, what just happened? -What?
We were sitting here together, having fun...
...and now we're watching them have fun.
translation.es: ...y ahora estamos aquí viendocómo se divierten.

translation.en: That's what girls do. You know boys and their toys.
translation.es: Eso hacen las chicas.Conoces a los chicos y sus juguetes.

translation.en: -Give me a quarter. -Why?
Just give me a quarter. I'll show you what girls do.
translation.es: Solo dame una moneda.Te mostraré lo que hacen las chicas.

translation.en: Thank you.
Gentlemen, it was a pleasure.
What?
-Blow me! -Let's take it outside. Come on.
Hey, it's Reid and Tyler. Grab my jacket.
translation.es: Oye, son Reid y Tyler.Toma mi chaqueta.

translation.en: -You guys need help? -Just stay with the girls.
Get him, Reid!
Let's go. Bring it on, man.
He made the shot, dickhead. You bet him he couldn't and he did.
translation.es: Logró el tiro, idiota.Apostaste a que no podía y lo hizo.

translation.en: We ain't paying you shit, so if you don't like it--
translation.es: No te pagaremos ni una mierda,así que si no te gusta...

translation.en: What's the problem?
He bet me I couldn't make a combo shot, and I did.
translation.es: Me apostó a que no podría hacerun tiro combinado y lo hice.

translation.en: -Everyone just forget about it, okay? -Hey! Take it someplace else, ladies.
translation.es: -Olvídenlo todos, ¿está bien?-¡Oigan! Vayan a otro lado, señoritas.

translation.en: -Now. -Whatever you say, Nicky.
-What were you thinking? -We were just playing them.
translation.es: -¿En qué estabas pensando?-Solo jugábamos con ellos.

translation.en: Yeah, come on, Caleb. They were suckers for it.
translation.es: Vamos, Caleb.Eran tontos que se lo buscaron.

translation.en: Why don't you quit being such a pussy?
translation.es: ¿Por qué no dejas de ser tan cobarde?

translation.en: I'm not finished with you yet.
Reid, stop.
What will it take for you to get it?
translation.es: ¿Qué se necesitará para que lo entiendas?

translation.en: It's addictive, you moron!
You've seen what it can do if you abuse it.
translation.es: Ya viste lo que puede hacersi abusas de él.

translation.en: You want that? That's your business.
But if you use in the open, like you did tonight, you risk exposing us all.
translation.es: Pero si lo usas abiertamente, como hoy,nos expones a todos.

translation.en: And that I won't let happen.
translation.es: Y no dejaré que eso pase.

translation.en: -My power's greater than yours. -Not until you ascend.
translation.es: -Mi poder es más fuerte que el tuyo.-No hasta que asciendas.

translation.en: All right, go for it, tough guy.
-Stop it! This is crazy. -It's for his own good!
translation.es: -¡Basta! Esto es una locura.-¡Es por su propio bien!

translation.en: Keep using like you did tonight and last night...
translation.es: Sigue usándolo como lo usasteesta noche y ayer...

translation.en: ...you'll be as good as dead.
So I fixed her car. Big deal!
Don't play me, Reid! I'm talking later and you know it.
translation.es: ¡No quieras engañarme, Reid!Hablo de más tarde y lo sabes.

translation.en: The hell I do!
I didn't use later.
It's not right using on each other, Caleb.
translation.es: No está bien usarlo entre nosotros, Caleb.

translation.en: Tell it to Reid.
Reid's lying. It had to have been him.
translation.es: Reid miente. Tuvo que haber sido él.

translation.en: How do you know?
Because it wasn't you. Tyler doesn't have the balls to lie to me.
translation.es: Porque no fuiste tú.Tyler no tiene las bolas para mentirme.

translation.en: -Hey. -Hey.
-You okay? -Yeah.
-Yeah, I'm fine. -Let's go.
Yeah, let's get out of here.
Thanks again for a great day. I had fun.
translation.es: Gracias de nuevo por un gran día.Me divertí.

translation.en: Yeah. Yeah, me too.
Listen, I'm sorry about Gorman.
He's just not used to seeing me with anyone.
translation.es: Es que no está acostumbradoa verme con alguien.

translation.en: I think I'll survive.
Fact is, you're the only girl I've ever taken out there.
translation.es: Sucede que eres la única chicaque he llevado allá.

translation.en: -Really? -Yeah.
-And why is that? -I'm not sure just yet.
translation.es: -¿Y por qué fue eso?-Todavía no estoy seguro.

translation.en: -Good night. -Good night.
Kate, wake up! Kate, wake up!
Yeah.
I just saw the same darkling you saw last night. That dead kid at the Dells.
translation.es: Acabo de ver el mismo espectro que tú.El chico muerto en Dells.

translation.en: What the hell is it?
I don't know. It's starting to freak me out.
translation.es: No sé. Empiezo a sentir miedo.

translation.en: I'm telling you, someone's using powers...
translation.es: Te diré algo, alguien usa sus poderes...

translation.en: ...and I mean bigtime.
And I intend to find out who.
-Hey. -Hi.
Good morning.
Mr. Danvers...
...Provost Higgins requests the pleasure of your company after class.
translation.es: ...el rector Higgins solicita el placerde su compañía después de clases.

translation.en: We're going to study four American contemporary writers of fiction.
translation.es: Estudiaremos a cuatro escritoresestadounidenses contemporáneos de ficción.

translation.en: First is Cormac McCarthy, then Tim O'Brien...
...Kent Haruf, and last but not least...
translation.es: ...Kent Haruf y por últimopero no menos importante...

translation.en: -...Stephen King. -Yeah! Dreamcatcher was the shit!
translation.es: -...Stephen King.-¡Sí! Dreamcatcher fue la gran mierda.

translation.en: Thank you, Mr. Garwin, but no. My choice is The Shining.
translation.es: Gracias, señor Garwin, pero no.Elegí El Resplandor.

translation.en: This is not the kind of publicity this institution is interested in.
translation.es: No es el tipo de publicidadque le interesa a esta institución.

translation.en: You wouldn't know anything about it, would you, Mr. Danvers?
translation.es: Usted no sabe nada sobre esto,¿verdad, señor Danvers?

translation.en: No, sir.
But you would know about a fight at a local bar last night.
translation.es: Pero sabe algo de una peleaen un bar local anoche.

translation.en: -Sir, if I could-- -And if I'm correct...
translation.es: -Señor, si me permite...-Y si estoy correcto...

translation.en: ...Chase Collins was with you?
Yes, sir.
Chase Collins comes to us with a brilliant academic record...
translation.es: Chase Collins llega aquícon un brillante historial académico...

translation.en: ...and his family trust has made a generous endowment...
translation.es: ...y su fideicomiso familiarhizo un generoso donativo...

translation.en: ...to this institution.
I want to make sure he has a positive experience at Spenser.
translation.es: Quiero asegurarme de que tendráuna experiencia positiva en Spenser.

translation.en: -Do I make myself clear? -Yes, sir.
Good.
I understand you and Chase have already bonded...
translation.es: Entiendo que usted y Chaseya hicieron amistad...

translation.en: ...and I would appreciate it if you would continue...
...to take him under your wing, make sure his stay here is a pleasant one.
translation.es: ...aceptándolo en su grupo, se asegurede que su estancia aquí sea agradable.

translation.en: -And, Caleb. -Sir?
No more fights.
Yes, sir.
What is that?
Caleb's family history.
translation.es: La historia de la familia de Caleb.

translation.en: Did you know that the witchcraft thing started here in Ipswich?
translation.es: ¿Sabías que eso de la brujeríacomenzó aquí en Ipswich?

translation.en: Every time I ask Pogue about it, he just tells me it's all nonsense.
translation.es: Cada que le pregunto a Pogue sobre eso,solo me dice que es una tontería.

translation.en: So, what did the provost want?
Someone told him about the fight at Nicky's.
translation.es: Alguien le dijo sobre la pelea en Nicky's.

translation.en: Feel like elaborating on that?
You got a piece of glass in your face. Hold on.
translation.es: Tienes un pedazo de vidrio en la cara.Espera.

translation.en: -Say my name! -Grow up, dude.
What are you looking at, fag?
That thing between your legs.
It's like a penis, only smaller.
translation.es: Es como un pene, pero más pequeño.

translation.en: Hey, let him go, Aaron!
Don't be so sensitive, Aaron.
Size isn't everything.
translation.es: El tamaño no es tan importante.

translation.en: My man.
Up for some foosball?
I have dinner with Sarah, but I think I can hang out for a while.
translation.es: Voy a cenar con Sarah,pero creo que puedo salir un rato.

translation.en: -What about you? -No, man. I'm cool.
translation.es: -¿Qué hay de ti?-No, viejo. Estoy bien.

translation.en: You're being ridiculous! What is your problem?
-Chase is my problem. -What, are you jealous?
-I don't want you hanging around him. -Look, he is just a friend.
translation.es: -No quiero que andes cerca de él.-Mira, solo es un amigo.

translation.en: Yeah, right. I'm sure he's interested in just being friends.
translation.es: Sí, claro.De seguro solamente le interesa ser amigos.

translation.en: This is beyond idiotic.
translation.es: Esto va más allá de ser idiota.

translation.en: Thanks for dinner.
-How about Saturday? -What about Saturday?
translation.es: -¿Qué hay del sábado?-¿Qué hay del sábado?

translation.en: -It's the Fall Fest. -Oh, Fall Fest.
translation.es: -Es el Festival de Otoño.-Ah, Festival de Otoño.

translation.en: Just wondering if you wanted to go with me.
translation.es: Me preguntaba si quisieras ir conmigo.

translation.en: And, also, it happens to be my birthday.
translation.es: Y sucede que también es mi cumpleaños.

translation.en: I don't know.
I'd love to go with you.
-I should go. -Yeah. Yeah, you should.
-No. I mean, back to the dorms. -Yeah, I know what you mean.
translation.es: -No. Digo, regresar al dormitorio.-Sí, sé lo que quieres decir.

translation.en: I'm really gonna go.
This is me leaving.
-Good night. -Good night.
Sleep tight.
I hate him when he's like this.
translation.es: Lo odio cuando se pone así.

translation.en: He's been jealous since the day we met. It drives me crazy.
translation.es: Está celoso desde el díaque nos conocimos. Me vuelve loca.

translation.en: You don't hate Pogue. You guys are perfect for each other.
translation.es: Tú no odias a Pogue.Son perfectos el uno para el otro.

translation.en: Maybe not.
Maybe it's time to check out something new.
translation.es: Tal vez sea el momentode probar algo nuevo.

translation.en: And maybe that's what Pogue's picking up on.
translation.es: Y tal vez eso sealo que Pogue está sintiendo.

translation.en: -This is the eighth time he's called. -So talk to him.
translation.es: -Es la octava vez que llama.-Entonces habla con él.

translation.en: No. Not until he stops being an idiot.
translation.es: No. No hasta que deje de ser un idiota.

translation.en: I'll bet Caleb's not the jealous type.
translation.es: Apuesto a que Caleb no es celoso.

translation.en: Go for it!
Come on, man!
Come on, Pogue!
-He really is good. -He's the best.
I hear you swim a mean freestyle.
translation.es: Oí que eres bueno en el estilo libre.

translation.en: -That's what they tell me. -Let's see what you got.
Let's go!
Push off! Let's go!
You okay, man?
There you are. Had us going there for a second.
translation.es: Ahí estás.Nos espantaste por un momento.

translation.en: Whacked your head pretty good.
translation.es: Te golpeaste muy fuerte la cabeza.

translation.en: Lucky for you, Chase was there to get you out...
translation.es: Por suerte para ti,Chase te pudo sacar...

translation.en: ...before you sucked up the pool.
translation.es: ...antes de que te tragaras la piscina.

translation.en: He also whipped your ass.
It became apparent that the view of civil liberties...
translation.es: Se volvió evidente que la posturade las libertades civiles...

translation.en: ...needing no special protection was not widely shared.
translation.es: ...sin protección especialno era compartida por todos.

translation.en: Come in. Thank you.
Twelve amendments were suggested, 10 eventually ratified.
Called the what, Ms. Snider?
-The Bill of Rights. -Right you are.
Arguably, the first being the most important. Read it for us, Mr. Simms.
translation.es: Se supone que la primera es la másimportante. Léala, señor Simms.

translation.en: Mr. Collins, you're wanted in the provost's office.
translation.es: Señor Collins, se le solicitaen la oficina del rector.

translation.en: Mr. Simms.
"Congress shall make no law...
...respecting an establishment of religion...
...or prohibiting the free exercise thereof...
...or abridging the freedom of speech, or of the press...
translation.es: ...o que coarte la libertad de palabrao de prensa...

translation.en: ...or the right of the people peaceably to assemble...."
-Provost Higgins. You wanted to...? -Chase, come in.
You know one of our students lost his life...
translation.es: Sabe que uno de nuestros estudiantesperdió la vida...

translation.en: ...a few nights back at the Dells.
Yes, I heard.
-Did you know him? -No, sir. Why?
His car was returned to his parents.
translation.es: Le devolvieron el auto a sus padres.

translation.en: His mother was kind enough to send this back to us.
translation.es: Su madre fue bastante amablecomo para devolvernos esto.

translation.en: -My student ID. I lost it that night. -It was in the back seat.
translation.es: -Mi identificación. La perdí esa noche.-Estaba en el asiento trasero.

translation.en: That's odd. I wonder how he got it.
translation.es: Qué raro. Me pregunto cómo la encontró.

translation.en: -Thank you, sir. -You're welcome.
I understand you've become close with Caleb and his friends.
translation.es: Entiendo que se ha vuelto cercanode Caleb y sus amigos.

translation.en: Yeah. They're great guys, sir.
I agree. You couldn't have picked a better bunch.
translation.es: Estoy de acuerdo.No pudo elegir un grupo mejor.

translation.en: I think so too.
-Am I gonna see you tonight? -I hope so.
Listen, I have something to do first. I'll give you a call later, okay?
translation.es: Escucha, debo hacer algo primero.Ta llamo después, ¿sí?

translation.en: -I'll be in my room. -Okay.
What'd she say about Kate? Why won't she call me back?
translation.es: ¿Qué dijo acerca de Kate?¿Por qué no me contesta?

translation.en: She's still pissed at you.
-Why are we doing this? -I saw the darkling again.
translation.es: -¿Por qué hacemos esto?-Volví a ver el espectro.

translation.en: Yeah, but why break into the admissions office?
translation.es: Pero ¿para qué nos metemosa la oficina del admisiones?

translation.en: Because I wanna know more about Chase Collins.
translation.es: Porque quiero saber mássobre Chase Collins.

translation.en: Look, I don't even like the guy.
translation.es: A mí ni siquiera me agrada ese tipo.

translation.en: Are you sure you're not just imagining this?
translation.es: ¿Estás seguro de que no estásnada más imaginando esto?

translation.en: I'm telling you, his eyes were as black as night in the pool today.
translation.es: Te digo que sus ojos estaban tan negroscomo la noche en la piscina.

translation.en: All right.
Well, how sick is she?
She came in complaining of chills and a headache.
translation.es: Llegó quejándose de escalofríosy dolor de cabeza.

translation.en: Within an hour, she had a 101-degree temperature.
translation.es: En una hora ya tenía 33.8 gradosde temperatura.

translation.en: -What could it be? -The doctor's checking her now.
translation.es: -¿Cómo puede ser?-El doctor la está revisando.

translation.en: -We'll call you when we know more. -It's okay. I'm coming over there.
translation.es: -Te llamaremos cuando sepamos más.-Está bien. Voy para allá.

translation.en: They died in a car accident.
translation.es: Murieron en un accidente de auto.

translation.en: It says Chase's father just lost control.
translation.es: Dice que el padre de Chaseperdió el control.

translation.en: His real name was Pope.
Chase Goodwin Pope. Born July 14th, 1988.
translation.es: Chase Goodwin Pope.Nacido el 14 de julio de 1988.

translation.en: The Collins adopted him after his mother died...
translation.es: Los Collins lo adoptaronal morir su madre...

translation.en: ...when he was 2 years old.
-When did you say his birthday was? -July 14th.
That's the same day his adoptive parents died.
translation.es: El mismo día que murieronsus padres adoptivos.

translation.en: -What year was he born? -1988.
They died on his 18th birthday.
Why are you taking her to the hospital at Gloucester?
translation.es: ¿Por qué la llevan al hospitalen Gloucester?

translation.en: Her temperature's jumped to 105...
...and she's showing symptoms of anaphylactic shock.
-What does that mean? -It's a severe allergic reaction.
translation.es: -¿Qué significa eso?-Es una reacción alérgica grave.

translation.en: -To what? -We're not sure.
It's as if she'd been bitten by hundreds of insects.
translation.es: Es como si la hubieran mordidocientos de insectos.

translation.en: Like spiders.
-That's where I've heard it before. -What are you talking about?
translation.es: -Ahí es donde lo oí antes.-¿De qué estás hablando?

translation.en: The Book of Damnation. They used to call her Goody Pope.
translation.es: El Libro de la Perdición.La llamaban Goody Pope.

translation.en: Do you remember her?
I haven't read the Book since we were kids.
translation.es: No he leído el librodesde que éramos niños.

translation.en: Just call Reid and Tyler.
translation.es: Nada más llama a Reid y Tyler.

translation.en: I told them everything.
About the darkling, what we found in his file....
translation.es: Sobre el espectro,lo que encontramos en su archivo.

translation.en: It's a list of names...
...who brought charges against John Putnam and his family...
translation.es: ...de quienes presentaron cargoscontra John Putnam y su familia...

translation.en: ...during the Salem hunt. Pope was one of them.
translation.es: ...durante la cacería de Salem.Pope fue uno de ellos.

translation.en: Widow of Jacob, mother to Hagen.
translation.es: Viuda de Jacob, madre de Hagen.

translation.en: So what?
So she claims that John Putnam came to her as an incubus in her dreams...
translation.es: Ella afirma que John Putnamse le apareció en sueños como íncubo...

translation.en: ...after she was widowed.
The Book also records births and deaths during the damnation.
translation.es: El Libro también registra nacimientosy muertes durante la condenación.

translation.en: Goody Pope's husband, Jacob, died June 4th, 1692.
translation.es: El esposo de Goody Pope, Jacob,murió el 4 de junio de 1692.

translation.en: Her son, Hagen, was born April 11th, 1693.
translation.es: Su hijo, Hagen,nació el 11 de abril de 1693.

translation.en: That's 10 months and 24 days later.
If what you're saying is true...
translation.es: Si lo que dices es cierto...

translation.en: ...and Hagen Pope is the bastard son of John Putnam...
translation.es: ...y Hagen Pope es hijo bastardode John Putnam...

translation.en: ...then the fifth bloodline in the Covenant didn't end in Salem.
translation.es: ...entonces la quinta línea de sangredel Pacto no terminó en Salem.

translation.en: -And Chase is one of us. -That's crazy.
translation.es: -Y Chase es uno de nosotros.-Es una locura.

translation.en: He can't be.
The night after the party at the Dells...
translation.es: La noche después de la fiestaen Dells...

translation.en: ...someone was using.
The Power was strong enough to wake me.
translation.es: El Poder fue tan fuerteque me despertó.

translation.en: The next night, it happened again.
translation.es: A la noche siguiente volvió a pasar.

translation.en: -I felt it then. -See? I told you.
I felt it too.
When you said it wasn't you, were you lying?
translation.es: Cuando dijiste que no fuiste tú,¿estabas mintiendo?

translation.en: -You swear? -I swear.
Then it was him.
-Hey, could I call you--? -Caleb, Kate's been attacked.
Wait, wait. What?
They say it's like she's been bitten by spiders...
translation.es: Dicen que escomo si la hubieran mordido arañas...

translation.en: ...and I had this terrible nightmare about spiders.
translation.es: ...y yo tuve una terrible pesadillasobre arañas.

translation.en: I'm scared, Caleb. Something weird is happening.
translation.es: Tengo miedo, Caleb.Algo raro está pasando.

translation.en: Okay, listen. I want you to go back to your dorm...
...and wait for me there.
-I'll see you soon, okay? -Okay.
He's put a spell on Kate.
What are you talking about? What kind of spell?
Creation.
Spiders.
They're taking her to a hospital in Gloucester.
translation.es: La llevan a un hospital en Gloucester.

translation.en: Don't do anything until we know what he wants.
translation.es: No hagas nadahasta que sepamos qué quiere.

translation.en: We're talking about Kate!
Come to save Little Miss Muffet, have we?
translation.es: Viniste a salvar a la dulce niña,¿verdad?

translation.en: Well, you're too late.
A spider came and sat down beside her...
translation.es: Una araña bajó y se sentó junto a ella...

translation.en: ...and frightened Miss Muffet away.
translation.es: ...y espantó a la pobre niña bella.

translation.en: You hurt Kate, and I'll kill you.
translation.es: Si lastimas a Kate te voy a matar.

translation.en: Hurt her?
I only used her to get to you.
translation.es: Solo la usé para llegar a ti.

translation.en: It's you that I'm gonna hurt.
translation.es: Es a ti al que voy a lastimar.

translation.en: And you're just my bait to get to Caleb.
translation.es: Y tú solo eres mi carnadapara llegar a Caleb.

translation.en: These are her things.
Why don't you go back to the dorm and get some sleep?
translation.es: ¿Por qué no regresas al dormitorioy duermes un poco?

translation.en: If I hear anything, I'll call you.
translation.es: Si me entero de algo, te avisaré.

translation.en: Hey.
What's wrong?
Have you seen Pogue?
No, but I called him and told him about Kate.
translation.es: No, pero lo llamé y le dije lo de Kate.

translation.en: Well, how is she?
Not so good. But they said they'd call if there are any changes.
translation.es: No muy bien.Pero dijeron que llamarían si hay cambios.

translation.en: Maybe this is him.
Pogue's been in an accident.
Stop right there.
Close the door.
Let's just keep this between the Sons of Ipswich.
translation.es: Mantengamos esto soloentre los Hijos de Ipswich.

translation.en: Don't hurt her. She has nothing to do with this.
translation.es: No la lastimes.Ella no tiene nada que ver con esto.

translation.en: Whether she lives or dies is entirely up to you, my friend.
translation.es: Que ella viva o mueradepende totalmente de ti, amigo mío.

translation.en: You can't imagine what it was like growing up not knowing what this was.
translation.es: No te imaginas lo que fue crecersin saber qué era esto.

translation.en: When I finally found my real father, he filled in all the missing pieces.
translation.es: Cuando encontré a mi verdadero padre,él aportó las piezas que faltaban.

translation.en: But it was too late. I was hooked.
translation.es: Pero era demasiado tarde.Yo ya estaba enganchado.

translation.en: By then, he was such a bitter old man--
translation.es: Para entoncesél era un viejo tan amargado...

translation.en: Or I should say, bitter, old, young man.
translation.es: O debo decir joven viejo amargado.

translation.en: --that all he wanted to do was end the suffering.
translation.es: ...que todo lo que quería hacerera terminar su sufrimiento.

translation.en: Like all our bloodline before us...
...he was more than willing to break the laws...
translation.es: ...estaba más que dispuestoa romper las leyes...

translation.en: ...of your sacred little club.
So I got him to give me his share of The Power.
translation.es: Así que logré que me dierasu parte de El Poder.

translation.en: And he died knowing that his son was going to get revenge...
translation.es: Él murió sabiendo que su hijose vengaría...

translation.en: ...on your Covenant.
You keep her in that spell, and she'll die.
translation.es: Si la mantienes en ese hechizose va a morir.

translation.en: I know.
What is this all about? I mean, what do you want?
translation.es: ¿De qué se trata esto?Es decir, ¿qué quieres?

translation.en: Want?
I'm Chase Collins.
I have everything I could possibly want.
translation.es: Tengo todo lo que podría querer.

translation.en: It's what I need.
More power.
Tomorrow night, birthday boy...
...at the exact moment when you ascend...
...be at Putnam Barn...
...where you will will me your power.
Do that, and I'll let her live.
translation.es: Hazlo y dejaré que ella viva.

translation.en: And Pogue, Kate, Reid and Tyler and your mom...
translation.es: Y a Pogue, Kate, Reid y Tylery tu mamá...

translation.en: ...and what's left of the families.
translation.es: ...y lo que quede de las familias.

translation.en: And don't think I won't kill them.
translation.es: Y no creas que no los mataría.

translation.en: It comes natural to me.
Just ask my adoptive parents.
translation.es: Solo pregunta a mis padres adoptivos.

translation.en: You killed that kid at the Dells.
translation.es: Tú mataste a ese chico en Dells.

translation.en: Well, he caught me doing a little magic.
translation.es: Bueno, me sorprendióhaciendo algo de magia.

translation.en: At first, he wasn't sure, but then, well...
translation.es: Al principio no estaba seguro,pero luego, bueno...

translation.en: ...he just wouldn't leave it alone.
So I caught a ride with him over to the bonfire.
translation.es: Así que me fui con él a la fogata.

translation.en: What are you doing?
Just making sure I'm making my point.
translation.es: Solamente me asegurode dejar clara mi postura.

translation.en: Do you see my problem here?
I like to use. A lot.
Only...
...no one ever told me about...
...the effects and the damage.
The addiction.
And we both know what happens, now, don't we?
translation.es: Y ambos sabemos lo que pasa ahora,¿no es así?

translation.en: So...
...the way I see it...
...I add your power to what I already have.
translation.es: ...añado tu poder a lo que ya tengo.

translation.en: It won't stop the aging.
Your father obviously found out the hard way.
translation.es: Obviamente tu padre lo descubriópor las malas.

translation.en: My father never had this kind of power.
translation.es: Mi padre nunca tuvo esta clase de poder.

translation.en: It doesn't work like that.
It's the body that wears down, not the power.
translation.es: El cuerpo se desgasta, no el poder.

translation.en: Just think of yourself as a sacrificial lamb.
translation.es: Considera que eres un corderopara el sacrificio.

translation.en: Hell...
...you're already their golden boy.
Why not go out a real hero?
translation.es: ¿Por qué no te vuelves un héroe real?

translation.en: So tomorrow night, the barn.
translation.es: Mañana en la noche, el granero.

translation.en: Where it all started.
A birthday party. Just you and me.
translation.es: Una fiesta de cumpleaños. Solo tú y yo.

translation.en: It's either you...
...or them...
...brother.
Don't leave her like that. She'll die.
What happened?
-You passed out when I told you-- -What?
-Pogue's been in an accident. -Is he okay?
Hey, hey, take it easy.
-What? -Stay away.
He's more powerful...
...than you can imagine.
Hey, don't worry. Don't worry about that.
translation.es: No te preocupes.No te preocupes por eso.

translation.en: We can't stop him.
-How is he? -He's hurt pretty bad.
-Where's Sarah? -Waiting room.
translation.es: -¿Dónde está Sarah?-En la sala de espera.

translation.en: I say we all go after Chase. Right now.
translation.es: Digo que vayamos tras de Chase.Ahora mismo.

translation.en: Listen, it may not be that easy.
translation.es: Escucha, tal vez no sea tan fácil.

translation.en: You guys stay here with Pogue. Call me if there's a change.
translation.es: Ustedes quédense con Pogue.Llámenme si hay cambios.

translation.en: How's Pogue?
He's not good.
What about Kate? Have you heard anything?
They stabilized her, but she's still really sick.
Caleb, look me in the eye and tell me the truth.
translation.es: Caleb, mírame a los ojosy dime la verdad.

translation.en: The spiders.
I read about them. They're one of the charges against John Putnam.
translation.es: Leí sobre ellas. Fue uno de los cargoscontra John Putnam.

translation.en: They're some kind of spell, aren't they?
translation.es: Son alguna clase de hechizo,¿no es verdad?

translation.en: I wanna show you something...
...and then I'll explain everything.
Don't be afraid.
What about your caretaker?
It'll be okay.
-What are you doing? -It's all right.
-Caleb.... -This is important to me, Gorman.
It's okay.
This is William Danvers III, my father.
translation.es: Él es William Danvers III,mi padre.

translation.en: He's 44 years old.
Every generation, the bloodlines produce only one:
translation.es: Cada generación,los linajes producen uno solo.

translation.en: The eldest male.
And you've always had this power?
At 13, you get a taste of it. It's a test, in a way.
translation.es: A los 13 empiezas a sentirlo.En cierto sentido es una prueba.

translation.en: At 18, we ascend, and our powers fully mature...
translation.es: A los 18 ascendemos,nuestros poderes están totalmente maduros...

translation.en: ...and it's seductive.
And some can handle it, and others, like my father, couldn't.
translation.es: Algunos pueden manejarlo y otros,como mi padre, no pueden.

translation.en: Tonight, at 12 minutes past 11, I'll ascend.
translation.es: Esta noche, 12 minutos después de las 11,voy a ascender.

translation.en: And what if you don't will him your share?
translation.es: ¿Y qué pasa si no le entregas tu parte?

translation.en: He's already got his father's. It makes him very powerful.
translation.es: Ya tiene la de su padre.Eso lo hace muy poderoso.

translation.en: And what if someone wills you their share?
translation.es: ¿Y si alguien te da su parte?

translation.en: It's against the Covenant laws. If it weren't, I wouldn't let them.
translation.es: Va contra las leyes del Pacto.Si no fuera así, yo no los dejaría.

translation.en: -Why not? -When one ascends...
...The Power becomes your life.
That's why it ages you.
Will it away, and you die.
Caleb, you cannot do this alone. We have to go to the others.
translation.es: Caleb, no puedes hacerlo solo.Debemos ir con los demás.

translation.en: We can't do that. He'll kill us all, including you.
translation.es: No podemos hacerlo.Nos matará a todos, incluyéndote.

translation.en: Pogue was the final warning.
-We have to go to your father. -No.
I know what you're thinking, Mother, and you know what'll happen.
translation.es: Sé lo que piensas, madre,y ya sabes lo que va a pasar.

translation.en: But he loves you.
Well, then, he'll die with that secret.
-Where's Sarah? -Upstairs, changing.
-You should never have involved her. -You're right.
But I can't change the past...
translation.es: Pero no puedo cambiar el pasado...

translation.en: ...and he's using her against me, all of you...
translation.es: ...y él la está usando contra mí,a todos ustedes...

translation.en: ...and it's going to stop.
I want you to take Sarah to the dance.
translation.es: Quiero que lleven a Sarah al baile.

translation.en: I'll meet you there. I don't think he'll try anything in the open.
translation.es: Los encontraré ahí.No intentará nada frente a todos.

translation.en: Would you just let us help you? You know we've got your back.
translation.es: ¿Quieres dejar que te ayudemos?Sabes que te cubriremos la espalda.

translation.en: I know you do.
But please, just once, do what I ask.
translation.es: Pero, por favor, por una vez,hagan lo que les pido.

translation.en: You look beautiful, my dear.
-Ready? -Yeah.
Why can't I go with you?
-I won't risk you. -I'm scared.
Don't be.
-I'll see you soon. -You better.
I promise.
Be careful. I'll call you.
-Hey, any sign of him? -No.
Good. Listen, I'm on my way. If he does show...
translation.es: Bien. Escucha, voy en camino.Si aparece...

translation.en: ...please promise me you won't do anything stupid.
translation.es: ...por favor, prometeque no harás nada estúpido.

translation.en: -How's Sarah doing? Can I talk to her? -Yeah, she's fine. Hang on.
translation.es: -¿Cómo está Sarah? ¿Puedo hablarle?-Sí, está bien. Espera.

translation.en: -She was just here. -Guys, what's going on?
Caleb? Caleb?
What's your plan? You can't beat me, you know.
translation.es: ¿Cuál es tu plan?No puedes vencerme, ya sabes.

translation.en: Something's happened.
You know...
...I'm just getting the feeling that...
...you're not gonna keep up your end of the bargain...
translation.es: ...no vas a cumplir tu partedel trato...

translation.en: ...so I took out a little insurance policy.
translation.es: ...así que decidí traeruna póliza de seguros.

translation.en: She does look quite stunning.
You touch her, and she dies.
In fact, time's running out for Sarah.
translation.es: Es más, el tiempo se agota para Sarah.

translation.en: So why don't we get down to business?
Witchy.
Oops, wait.
Did I just say, "witch"?
All right. Tell you what. I'll make this easy for you.
translation.es: Bien. Te diré algo.Te facilitaré las cosas.

translation.en: How about an accident?
You lose control of your car on the way to the pathetic little dance.
translation.es: Pierdes el control del autode camino a tu patético baile.

translation.en: Trust me. I'm good at car accidents.
translation.es: Créeme.Soy bueno con accidentes de auto.

translation.en: Everyone'll miss you.
They'll say great things about you.
Only the Covenant will know the real truth.
translation.es: Solo el Pacto sabrá la verdad.

translation.en: But, to them, you'll become a legend.
translation.es: Pero para elloste volverás una leyenda.

translation.en: The one who gave his life for them.
translation.es: El que dio su vida por ellos.

translation.en: How about you let her go, and I let you live out your life?
translation.es: ¿Qué tal si la dejas iry yo te dejo vivir tu vida?

translation.en: How about I make you my "weyotch"?
translation.es: ¿Qué tal si te convierto en mi "perra"?

translation.en: I'll never will you my power.
Then it looks like trouble for Sarah.
translation.es: Pues parece que Sarah tendrá problemas.

translation.en: I'll never let that happen.
Fine. Let's do it your way.
Like taking candy from a baby.
translation.es: Como quitarle un dulce a un bebé.

translation.en: Easy as pie.
-You find her? -No.
Twelve minutes past 11.
Happy birthday, Caleb.
Are we ascending?
Finally!
Scary, huh, Caleb...
...this new power you get when you ascend?
translation.es: Este nuevo poder que recibescuando asciendes.

translation.en: Frankly, I don't think you're cut out for it.
translation.es: Francamente no creo que estés hecho para esto.

translation.en: So why don't we just call it a night?
translation.es: ¿Por qué no mejor lo dejamos ya?

translation.en: Just say the words.
Okay, I'm a little impressed.
-Not bad. -Thanks.
Trying to impress your date, huh?
You ready to say uncle?
I'm ready for you to go to hell.
translation.es: Estoy listo para que te vayas al infierno.

translation.en: Leave us, Gorman.
Just say the words.
Say the words, and it's all over.
translation.es: Di las palabras y todo terminará.

translation.en: Listen to me, William.
I need you to understand me.
Come on! Say it! Say the words!
...will you...
...nothing.
He is your son.
For once in your life, think of someone other than yourself.
translation.es: Por una vez en tu vida,piensa en algo más que tú mismo.

translation.en: ...will...
...my power.
We searched the entire area. We didn't find anybody.
translation.es: Buscamos en toda la zona.No encontramos a nadie.

translation.en: How can that be?
Where is he?
I don't know.
